text: The Vernonia Pioneer Museum is a history museum, located in Vernonia, Oregon, United States. The building that houses the museum is listed on the National Register of Historic Places as the Oregon–American Lumber Company Mill Office. ==References== ==External links== *Museum web site Category:National Register of Historic Places in Columbia County, Oregon Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1924 Category:History museums in Oregon Category:Museums in Columbia County, Oregon Category:1924 establishments in Oregon Category:Houses in Columbia County, Oregon
title: Vernonia Pioneer Museum
